1.name: HISLOOKS Demon Slayer Poster Decorative Painting Canvas Wall Art Living Room Posters Bedroom Painting 16x24inch (40x60cm)
1.description:
**1.** Poster prints Anime Wall Art.
**Size:**	16x24 inches. (Note: No Frame)
**Material:**	100% high quality waterproof canvas, does not fade easily, and is made of environment-friendly canvas paint that is compliant with the standard.

**2.** **Gift:** Will fit in any standard 12x16 frame. They also make a great one of a kind special gifts.

**3.** **Suitable for:** A simple art poster that makes a great addition to bedroom, hotel, dressing room, corridor, cafe, offices, or dormitory rooms by adding color and interest to the place. The perfect statement accent piece for the head of your bed, over a couch, or a hallway.

**4.** **Packaging:** Wrapped with care. Please [contact us](../contact/contact.html) if you have any problems with the item and shipping.

5.name: Demon Slayer : Kimetsu No Yaiba, Vol. 1, 1
5.description:
Tanjiro sets out on the path of the Demon Slayer to save his sister and avenge his family
In Taisho-era Japan, kindhearted Tanjiro Kamado makes a living selling charcoal. But his peaceful life is shattered when a demon slaughters his entire family. His little sister Nezuko is the only survivor, but she has been transformed into a demon herself Tanjiro sets out on a dangerous journey to find a way to return his sister to normal and destroy the demon who ruined his life.

Learning to destroy demons won't be easy, and Tanjiro barely knows where to start. The surprise appearance of another boy named Giyu, who seems to know what's going on, might provide some answers--but only if Tanjiro can stop Giyu from killing his sister first.


**ISBN-13**: 9781974700523
**ISBN-10**: 1974700526
**Publisher**: Viz Media
 **Publish Date**: July 2018
**Page Count**: 192
**Reading Level**: Ages 14-17
 **Dimensions**: 7.4 x 5 x 0.9 inches
**Shipping Weight**: 0.36 pounds

**Series**: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba #1

8.name: Haikyu!!, Vol. 1, 1
8.description:
Shoyo Hinata is out to prove that in volleyball you don't need to be tall to fly
Ever since he saw the legendary player known as "the Little Giant" compete at the national volleyball finals, Shoyo Hinata has been aiming to be the best volleyball player ever Who says you need to be tall to play volleyball when you can jump higher than anyone else?

After losing his first and last volleyball match against Tobio Kageyama, "the King of the Court," Shoyo Hinata swears to become his rival after graduating middle school. But what happens when the guy he wants to defeat ends up being his teammate?

9.name: Pop Up Parade Sword Art Online Progressive: Aria of a Starless Night Kirito
9.description:
**Manufacturer**: Good Smile Company
**Sculptor**: Design COCO
**Specifications**: Painted non-scale ABS & PVC figure with stand
**Height** (approx.)**:** 180 mm | 7.1"

*Order Limit: 3 per person*

**"My life is yours, Asuna. So I'll live for your sake."**
From Good Smile Company‚Äôs Pop Up Parade series of affordably priced and easy-to-display fixed-pose figures comes a figure of Kirito as he appears in the animated movie Sword Art Online Progressive: Aria of a Starless Night! Sculpted by Design COCO, he measures 7.1‚Äù tall and is captured in his Black Swordsman outfit from the Aincrad arc smiling confidently as he wields Dark Repulser in his left hand and reaches back to unsheath Elucidator with his right. A figure of Asuna is also up for pre-order at the same time, so make sure to get them both to keep the lovebirds together in your collection!

10.name: Nendoroid Tokino Sora
10.description:
**Manufacturer**: Max Factory
**Sculptor**: Shichibee
**Specifications**: Painted, articulated, non-scale ABS & PVC figure with optional parts and stand
**Height** (approx.): 100 mm | 3.9"

*Order Limit: 3 per person*

**‚ÄúHey, Sora-tomo! How are you all doing? It's me, Tokino Sora!‚Äù**

From Max Factory with sculpting by Shichibee comes a Nendoroid figure of the founding member of hololive production and their first-ever Virtual YouTuber - Tokino Sora! Measuring 3.9‚Äù tall, the easy-going, motherly Vtuber‚Äôs idol-like look has been faithfully recreated in chibi Nendoroid size, and she comes with three face plates to display her giving a bright smile, smiling with eyes closed, or staring.

Optional parts include her mascot teddy bear Ankimo, a pair of cat ears and cat paws, a mic she can hold, and interchangeable hand parts so you can display her on stage putting on a concert just for you! Also included is a special stand featuring her name and image color to display her on. Don‚Äôt miss out on adding Sora-chan to your collection!

14.name: OCQBI Demon Slayer Figure - Magic Cube Studio Shinobu Kocho Resin Made 1/6 Scale Statue, 52 cm (20.5 Inch) High, Senior and Delicate Figure Statue
14.description:
**[Product Specs]**
Kimetsu no Yaiba (Demon Slayer) Kochou Shinobu 1/6 Scale Resin Made Statue, Approximately 520 mm, painted finished figure

**[Statue Dimensions]**
52 cm √ó 35 cm √ó 45 cm

**[Collection Level GK Figure]**
There is a high quality original color box package, complete with protective material, and a unique numbered nameplate. Production is expected to be completed in January 2021 and certain sales times may be delayed or advanced. Delivered to international logistics within one week after the end of production.

**[Please check directly before signing for the express]**
The value of this product is relatively high. For product safety, we have implemented multiple layers of protection on the packaging and put in full insurance. If the inspection finds any damage, we will ask the logistics company to compensate and assist in repairing or sending the damaged parts.

**[Yukiya's evaluation]**
If one of the most beautiful and well-known Demon Slayer GK is selected in the world, this product must be among them. Up to now, the collection price of the Chinese version has exceeded three times that at the time of sale, and there is no market. Exquisite workmanship, perfect design, everything is the best. If you are a fan of Demon Slayer, believe me, it is worth buying.

15.name: Orange Rouge Haikyu!!: Shoyo Hinata (Jersey Version) Nendoroid Action Figure
15.description:
**A Nendoroid of Hinata wearing his sports jersey!**
From "Haikyu!!", the popular volleyball anime and manga series, comes an updated version of Nendoroid Shoyo Hinata wearing his sports jersey! He comes with a smiling expression overflowing with confidence, and the unique way that he wears his jersey has been faithfully preserved on the Nendoroid. Optional parts include meat buns and the bag he uses when going to the volleyball club. This version also includes a round base with a volleyball pattern as well as a background sheet based on the Sakanoshita Store! Be sure to display him with [Nendoroid Tobio Kageyama: Jersey Ver.](https://www.goodsmile.info/en/product/7011/Nendoroid+Tobio+Kageyama+Jersey+Ver.html)!

reviews.name: Trbefan
reviews.title: Worth it!
reviews.comment:
I got this Hinata Nendroid and wasn't expecting that good of quality because I see that most androids are around RM200-RM400, but this is great! For my first nendroid figure, I'm pretty happy.
‚Ä¢ Box came untouched, no damage!
‚Ä¢ It came with all parts, as promised! (Hinata himself, the two arms with the food, his bag, stand, and extra joint piece)
‚Ä¢ The paint job is well done, nothing messed up

reviews.name: Adam W
reviews.title: Really cute figurine
reviews.comment: Really love the figurine. I care a lot about the condition of the box, and there was a sticker on this one at the bottom which was impossible to remove without damaging the box. Got it for a great price so no real complaints but yeah..

reviews.name: Startica
reviews.title: Just Hinata in his school uniform
reviews.comment: He's the cutest thing I've ever gott in the mail. Thank you so much!

reviews.name: Maddie
reviews.title: Official!
reviews.comment: This is an official Nendroid. It comes with good add-on parts, amazing quality. I would recommend!
Good

16.name: Good Smile No Game No Life: Shiro PVC Figure (1:7 Scale)
16.description:
**A rerelease of the Shiro figure that brings out the No Game no Life universe!**
From the anime series *'No Game No Life'* comes a rerelease of the 1/7th scale figure of the younger of the *'Kuuhaku'* gamer siblings, Shiro! The creative touch and colors of the original illustration that the figure is based on have been faithfully preserved with careful sculptwork and painting.

Her special base features the pattern of a chess board as well as a miniaturized Imanity throne. Chibi character figures of Sora, Izuna, Jibril and Steph are all also included with the figure! Enjoy the No Game No Life world with just one figure!

25.name: Naruto Shipppuden Kakashi Sling Bag
25.description:
Ready to be the leader of your pack? This sling bag from Naruto Shippuden features a design inspired by Kakashi's suit. The front has a red patch of the Uzumaki clan symbol and a metal decal of his forehead protector. There are two zipper pockets on the front and side and one with hook and loop fastening tape closure. The main compartment has a lined tech sleeve, mesh zipper pocket and elastic straps to organize items such as pens or even gaming equipment. There is a hidden pocket on the back. Adjustable straps.

- 7" x 2" x 11"
- Polyester
- Imported

reviews.title: THE. BEST. BAG.
reviews.comment: Listen up, this backpack is everything I've ever wanted and MORE. It's the perfect size and perfect fit to substitute as a "purse". There are so many pockets, it's unbelievable. The strap is extra long to fit body sizes big and small, and the strap isn't fixed to one shoulder, you can adjust it to sling over either side! This bag is my new ride or die.

reviews.name: Hazzy
reviews.title: I love this bag!
reviews.comment: I bought this bag awhile ago and I use it daily! It is the perfect size and it holds everything so nicely! If you were thinking about buying this bag, DO IT! You will not regret it!

reviews.name: Konohagakure Scarecrow
reviews.title: Perfectly functional!
reviews.comment: Bought it yesterday because it was Kakashi-themed and a convenient size. Love it because of the high quality construction, all the pockets, water bottle holder, and the comfortable fit of the shoulder strap. It's already replaced my work bag and I'm considering another for cycling and day hikes! It even has space for Icha Icha Paradise!

reviews.name: mashjo
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Bought this for my son as he is now into this and he loves it. Excellent quality and it has so many pockets you can keep everything. Large enough for a water bottle as well.

reviews.name: Melamor12
reviews.title: Worth the wait!
reviews.comment: I waited 6 months to get this bag. It was worth the wait! I really love the style and abundant amount of pockets it has. It can fit my tablet or my Nintendo Switch easily. It could probably also fit most journals and pens. It is basically a mini jonin's vest backpack that makes you feel like a ninja with convenience. The bag is also super light wait.

reviews.name: Sharriao
reviews.title: So many pockets!
reviews.comment: This bag is the perfect size to carry around essentials and has a handy little pocket for everything. Plus it looks super cool and I get a lot of complements.

26.name: Bleach Vol. 1 (Japanese)
26.description:
**Product Name**: Bleach Vol. 1 (Japanese)
**Author/Illustrator**: Tite Kubo
**Publisher**: Shueisha
**Publication Date**: Jan. 1, 2002
**Book Size**: 18 cm | 7.1"
**Number of Pages**: 189
**Language**: Japanese

Ichigo Kurosaki is just an ordinary high schooler...with the ability to see ghosts. But even that doesn‚Äôt change his life nearly as much as meeting Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society who fights the Hollow, even spirits that prey on humans who have psychic energy. Caught in a fight with a Hollow, Rukia lends Ichigo some of her powers so he can save his family, only for him to absorb them completely and become a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself. Now, it‚Äôs his job along with Rukia to help protect the innocent of the world from the Hollow and help their spirits find peace in this action-packed manga by Tite Kubo.

Volume 1 of the Japanese manga, titled Strawberry and the Soul Reapers: The Death and the Strawberries, kicks off the story with chapters 1-7 and spans 189 pages.

reviews.name: Kyung Mo Yang
reviews.title: Good!!
reviews.comment:

There are 50 different water bottle stickers in each pack. This is a great gift designed for women, teen girls, boys, kids. Picking a gift can be challenging, but with this laptop stickers set you can't go wrong! Our waterproof stickers has a suitable size that meets your needs, can stick on different surface and remove without any effort.

All the computer stickers made of high quality vinyl with sun protection and waterproof, can prevent splashing in daily life and bring you more waterproof performance.

These vinyl stickers are ideal for your laptops, computers, keyboards, water bottles, hydroflasks, nalgenes, scrapbooks, mirrors, macbooks, notebooks, journals, luggage, skateboards, snowboards, bicycles, cars, guitars, and more.

reviews.name: Danni Meow
reviews.title: Flawless picture quality
reviews.comment: This is the best quality wall scroll I have and I have A LOT. The image is extremely sharp. It came packaged in quality bubble wrap to insure the product wasn‚Äôt damaged. 10/10 absolutely love it.

reviews.name: Jared Wolf
reviews.title: Vibrant and Decent Size
reviews.comment:
After the photo, I made took some string and I tied it around both sides of the black mounting piece and drilled only one hole. It's easy adjusted with the string.

I'm satisfied with this piece, it's so vibrant and pretty looking, definitely eye candy. The material is known for fraying with age, so as long as you are careful, it won't tear or rip. Stronger than paper by far.

It's not a normal paper poster, I kind of have a pet peeve with the glimmer and shine paper has when direct sunlight hits with, with this. You don't have to worry about that.
![customer's photo](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/A1yapkMUJ9L._SL1600_.jpg)

reviews.title: Great Pop, poor box.
reviews.comment: So, first off, the Pop itself is in pretty good condition. No issues or damage to the Pop. The box on the other hand was damaged. Large creases around the box and then there's the big upc sticker placed over the original upc on the box. Pops are collectibles and the big value comes from the condition of the box. I'll definitely bet looking for a replacement.![customer's picture](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81IGyKfLP2L._SL1600_.jpg)![customer's picture](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81XJaf-2c-L._SL1600_.jpg)
